Signal Class Users Guide

1. Introduction

The signal class was created to treat the notion of signals in an object oriented device server. Signals are mainly used for tracing and logging. This class should be used as a step to a generalised signal and configuration treatment.

The signal class offers a set of methods which can be executed on a signal object. The difference to a normal device server class is, that a signal object cannot be accessed via the network. No commands are available for this class. Also the signal objects are stateless, no state handler is available.
